name: Custom Music Review
author: Nilesh Chourasia

sections.description:
Custom Music review plugin support you to add an new post type with taxonomy, custom fields, feature images. Here you can add this into your wordpress site easily.

Docs & Support

You can mail me your query on [neelesh.chourasia@yahoo.co.in] and I will get back to your with your answers.

Custom music reviews Needs Your Support

It is hard to continue development and support for this free plugin without contributions from users like you. If you enjoy using Custom Music Review and find it useful, then please rate it. Your rating will help encourage and support the plugin’s continued development and better user support.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire custom-music-reviews folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

You will find ‘Music Reviews’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.
sections.faq:
Do you have questions or issues with Custom Music Reviews? Use these support channels appropriately.

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the entire custom-music-reviews folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

You will find ‘Music Reviews’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.
sections.changelog:
4.0.3

  • The contextual help tab has been added to admin pages.
  • Changed the admin menu icon to “music” dashicon.

1.1

  • Upgrade version from 4.3 to 4.4 and test it.

1.2

  • Upgrade version from 4.4 to 4.5 and test it.

1.3

  • Upgrade version from 4.5 to 4.6.1 and test it.
